sentences.english: The Saudi intent to thwart Iran's regional ambitions is clearest in Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阻遏伊朗地区野心的意图在黎巴嫩最为明显。

sentences.english: No one can stop the flight of the conceptual architects’ thought.
sentences.chinese: 谁也不能阻遏概念建筑师的思想天马行空。

sentences.english: Catabolite repression is considered as a main factor controlling yield of cellulases.
sentences.chinese: 降解物阻遏是菌株控制其产酶量的主要调节机制。

sentences.english: Losartan can suppress urinary albumin and glomerular hypertrophy in renal tissue.
sentences.chinese: 氯沙坦可降低尿白蛋白及阻遏早期肾小球肥大。

sentences.english: Partial block of energy-yielding metabolism seems to be the pos…
sentences.chinese: 抗降解物阻遏突变可能同产能代谢部分受阻有关。

sentences.english: The Codification of China's civil law is right on its way unconversably.
sentences.chinese: 中国民法法典化的脚步己不可阻遏地向前行进。

sentences.english: The commander sent out troops to stop the enemy's backup troops.
sentences.chinese: 司令员派出部队阻遏敌人的援兵。

definition: to hold back/to check (i.e. to stop sb's advance)/to resist/esp. with negative, irresistible, unstoppable etc
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
to make (military) incursions/to invade/to intrude into/to trespass/to gain unauthorized access (computing)
to enter by exploiting a weak spot (idiom); to take advantage of a lapse
